markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cel Rau](/Feats.aspx?ID=2343) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are a cel rau, child of a strigoi, one of the first vampires to walk Golarion. Your heritage ties you to the [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) and grants you strange resilience to light and darkness alike. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects with the [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39), [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100), or [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143) traits, and whenever you become [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) or [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for at least 2 rounds, you can reduce the duration by 1 round.

<title level="2">Cel Rau leads to...</title>
[Taste Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2349)
name: Cel Rau
